page.title: 09VILLAGE ACTIVITIES
page.content: The Badminton Club meets in the{Sedgwick village hall. The juniors {don't play matches}yet because they aren't{good enough. {Sedgwick}has a{junior(under {16)}and{two senior cricket {teams. The{Sedgwick Players}perform plays regularly.{During}the last{four {years, seven plays}have been{produced, {including "A Christmas Carol", "Our {Town"}(put on earlier this year), {Queen Elizabeth Slept Here", "Spring {and Port Wine", "The Unexpected {Guest",}and{"Wolf's Clothing". Adults {and children}are in the{plays. { Sedgwick House}has a{Christmas {party}every{year. There is an{annual village {sports}which is held at{Crosscrake {Primary School.}(See{Page 16}for further details)
